mapper.insert: insert into goods(id, name, volume, weight,tem,hum, price, goods_pic,status, user_id) value (#{id},#{name},#{volume},#{weight},#{tem},#{hum},#{price},#{goodsPic},1,#{userId})
mapper.select:
select goods.*,refrigerate_room.name as rmName from goods left join (room_goods left join refrigerate_room on room_goods.rm_id=refrigerate_room.id) on goods.id = room_goods.goods_id
user_id=#{userId}
and goods.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and goods.id like concat('%',#{id},'%')

select goods.*, refrigerate_room.name as rmName ,user.name as userName from (goods left join user on goods.user_id = user.id) left join (room_goods left join refrigerate_room on room_goods.rm_id = refrigerate_room.id) on goods.id = room_goods.goods_id
and goods.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and goods.id like concat('%',#{id},'%')
